item.title: Pack Flow Control and Shutoff Valves High Flow Mode – Models Without Auxiliary Fuel Tank Provisions

numlitem.para: Procedures are established and used to verify forward and aft lower lobe cargo compartments remain empty, or contain only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULDs), or fly Away Kits.

note.para: UPS does not carry Fly Away Kits in voided cargo compartments.

numlitem.para: Forward and Aft lower cargo compartment is empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment.

placard.para: Placard the HI FLOW switch "PACK - HIGH FLOW MODE INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
